rooms.description: Open living space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the front facade to enhance natural light and ventilation, designed in a Colonial style.
Adjacent to the living room; space for formal dining. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with the auspicious east direction.
Functional kitchen space with ample natural light from adjacent floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed following Indian residential norms.
Spacious bedroom with a view of the courtyard; designed for optimum privacy and comfort in a Colonial bungalow style.
Comfortable guest room with traditional Indian accents. Adjacent to the master bedroom for easy access.
Well-designed bathroom with natural light and ventilation; placed close to master bedroom in line with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling window on the front facade designed to maximize natural light and enhance colonial aesthetic. Vastu-compliant alignment.
Balcony facing the courtyard with floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation; positioned according to Vastu norms.
Main entrance door designed in colonial style, ensuring secure entry and aligning with local aesthetic norms.
